author: Michael Roberts
title: Denver Musician Amanda Capper's Brave Breast Cancer Battle
text:
Amanda Capper. Photo courtesy of Cristin Kobus Denver blog posts fight the good fight.
Related Stories Wanted: A Brewery for DIA's New Hotel At our Music blog, Oakland L. Childers shares details of popular local musician Amanda Capper's brave battle against breast cancer .
